suggest.nyholm/psr7: A minimal and very fast PSR7 implementation
suggest.opis/closure: Required if you want to cache routes that use closures [3.6.2]
suggest.illuminate/encryption: Required if you want to use strong encryption [8.40.0]
suggest.filp/whoops: Required if you want the pretty page error handler during devolopment
suggest.respect/validation: Required if you want to use the validation module
suggest.bjeavons/zxcvbn-php: A package by Dropbox to enfore validate password entroypy. Required for the auth package.
suggest.roots/wp-password-bcrypt: Required for the auth package for better wordpress password hashing
suggest.bacon/bacon-qr-code: Required for the auth package to genereate two-factor qr codes
suggest.pragmarx/google2fa: Required for the auth package to for 2FA Authentication [8.0.0]
